name: Path Dragger
description:
Build a path dragging blocks. Reach the flag. Conquer physics!

This game was made for TriJam #115. Theme: DRAG & DROP.

Things done before the Jam: 

  • Game Design
  • Level Design
  • Planning
  • Color Scheme Selection.

Premade Assets: 

  • Player Character/Controller
  • Music Loop + 2 SFX
  • DragAndDrop script.
